//You only fail when you stop trying...
#include <iostream>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int
#define inf 1000000000000
#define mod 1000000007
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define all(v) v.begin(),v.end()
#define S second
#define F first
#define boost1 ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
#define boost2 cin.tie(0);
#define mem(a,val) memset(a,val,sizeof a)
#define endl "\n"
#define maxn 100001

int main()
{
	boost1;boost2;	
	ll i,j,n,s,e,l,r,f=0,t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		f=0;
		cin>>s>>e;
		cin>>n;
		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			cin>>l>>r;
			if(!((l<=s && r<=s) || (l>=e && r>=e)))
			f=1;
		}
		if(f)
		cout<<"NO"<<endl;
		else
		cout<<"YES"<<endl;
	}	
	return 0;
}
